Use 'BLOCK_LOW_AND_ABOVE' Only | Generated by AI

Home 2025.10

You‚Äôre seeing this error:

Only block_low_and_above is supported for safetySetting.

This happens when you set safety_filter_level="BLOCK_MEDIUM_AND_ABOVE" (or any other value) in GenerateImagesConfig for the Imagen‚Äë4 models‚Äîbut at the time of your request (August‚ÄØ2025), the API only allows "BLOCK_LOW_AND_ABOVE" for image safety filtering on those models (Google Cloud).

‚úÖ How to fix your code

Simply update the safety_filter_level to the supported value:

from google import genai
from google.genai.types import GenerateImagesConfig

client = genai.Client()

image = client.models.generate_images(
    model="imagen-4.0-generate-preview-06-06",
    prompt="A dog reading a newspaper",
    config=GenerateImagesConfig(
        image_size="2K",
        number_of_images=1,
        safety_filter_level="BLOCK_LOW_AND_ABOVE",
        person_generation="ALLOW_ADULT",
    ),
)

image.generated_images[0].image.save("output-image.png")
print(
    f"Created image using {len(image.generated_images[0].image.image_bytes)} bytes"
)
  • safety_filter_level="BLOCK_LOW_AND_ABOVE": only this is supported for Imagen‚ÄØ4. Other thresholds like "BLOCK_MEDIUM_AND_ABOVE" will cause the 400 INVALID_ARGUMENT error (Medium, Google AI for Developers).
  • number_of_images=1 is explicit so it‚Äôs clear you‚Äôre requesting one image per call.

üßæ Other optional parameters:

  • person_generation="ALLOW_ADULT" is the default setting, but it‚Äôs fine to be explicit (blocks children; allows adult-domaint images) (Google Cloud).
  • image_size="2K" is valid per your code‚Äîjust make sure your SDK version supports it.

TL;DR ‚Äî Quick checklist

Step What to do
‚úÖ 1 Change safety_filter_level to "BLOCK_LOW_AND_ABOVE"
üßæ 2 Keep person_generation="ALLOW_ADULT" (or omit for default)
üö´ 3 Don‚Äôt use "BLOCK_MEDIUM_AND_ABOVE" or "BLOCK_ONLY_HIGH"
‚è± 4 Don‚Äôt change safety again until Google adds more levels

Let me know if you get another error‚Äîhappy to help!
